questions.question: What is a Bode plot?
options: A graph of the frequency response of a system
A graph of the time response of a system
A graph of the state-space model of a system
A graph of the input-output relationship of a system
questions.answer: A graph of the frequency response of a system

questions.question: What are the two components of a Bode plot?
What does the magnitude plot in a Bode plot represent?
options: The gain of the system as a function of frequency
The phase shift of the system as a function of frequency
The time response of the system
questions.answer: The gain of the system as a function of frequency
